Flying, first strike
[i]Reason to Fight[/i] – Whenever Cordelia, Perfect Mother attacks with another creature with flying, creatures you control with flying gain indestructible until end of turn.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Cordelia attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, she deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
Partner with Severa, Distant Daughter [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Severa into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]
